title: Inside a Learning Experience
subtitle: The components that make learning stick

detail.purpose: The complete journey a learner takes from not-knowing to understanding and application.
detail.howItWorks: Combines multiple elements in a sequence designed to build understanding progressively.
detail.keyInsight: Great learning experiences feel effortless - the complexity is hidden from the learner.

detail.purpose: Capture attention and activate prior knowledge before introducing new content.
detail.howItWorks: Uses questions, surprising facts, or relatable scenarios to create curiosity.
detail.keyInsight: Without activation, new information has nothing to 'stick' to in memory.

detail.purpose: Present new information in a clear, structured, and engaging way.
detail.howItWorks: Uses multiple modalities (visual, auditory, text) with careful pacing.
detail.keyInsight: Less is more - focus on essential concepts, not comprehensive coverage.

detail.purpose: Give learners opportunities to use what they've learned in meaningful ways.
detail.howItWorks: Includes exercises, scenarios, and problems that require applying concepts.
detail.keyInsight: Retrieval practice is more effective than re-reading or re-watching.

detail.purpose: Help learners understand what they got right, wrong, and why.
detail.howItWorks: Provides immediate, specific feedback that guides improvement.
detail.keyInsight: Effective feedback explains the 'why' - not just right/wrong.

detail.purpose: Help learners connect new knowledge to their own context and goals.
detail.howItWorks: Prompts self-reflection and planning for real-world application.
detail.keyInsight: Learning without reflection is just information - reflection creates transformation.

completionMessage: You've explored all the components! Notice how they form a cycle - great learning experiences are iterative.
